price: Wọn yóò máa gbé àwọn àwo góòlù àti àwọn ife ìmumi káà kiri ọ̀dọ̀ wọn. Ohun tí ẹ̀mí ń fẹ́ àti (ohun tí) ojú yóò máa dúnnú sí wà nínú rẹ̀. Olùṣegbére sì ni yín nínú rẹ̀.
arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِصِحَافٖ مِّن ذَهَبٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيهِ ٱلۡأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنُۖ وَأَنتُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yuṭāfu ʿalayhim biṣiḥāfin min dhahabin wa-akwābin wafīhā mā tashtahīhi al-anfusu wataladhu al-aʿyunu wa-antum fīhā khālidūna
